item.title: 1. All Out War
item.description:
Kingdom Of Peace
Ch1. Power in Arena (Start) Dreamer's escape and exploration City Shutdown and Emergency
Ch2. Broken Sword (Strength Master vs Supreme Body match in Ronna) A representative from North comes to South Empress Investigation and Corruption stains
Ch3. Wastelands (Small fight with fake saint/Nightmare) A rumor spreds about corruption Exploration at wastelands Help-Historical Controversy and Agreement Island of Gravity (Floating castle visit) Informative visit Learning history Ultimate Art ( art of learning and training era - Magic Master and Dreamer goes to Air Temple) The chosen one Grandmaster? Revenge (The saint reveals himself, the event happens when they are going to Plant Temple) Assasins Confusion (Supreme body or Saint?) Witchcraft (learning poison making, healing etc. in Plant Temple - kind of Ultimate Art Part 2) Secrets of the temple Learning and mastering darts Emperor's Will (Meet up with Great Emperor and Nightmare's Illusion - teleport to close of Isowitch) Trap Unknown History All Out (War - Cool Fight between Dreamer and Nightmare teams, Mythical Dragon Summon) Second Beast War A Nightmare or Reality? Fight to live Mythical Summon Twisted Reality (Betrayal of Supreme Commander, Death of Empress) Lost in reality Rewards and punishments World domination Doom and Gloom (Discovery of the scroll, Devil of Greed gets unsealed) Southern walkers Uncovered secrets A legend after centuries later (story)
Domination (world unites as one in a bad way, Magic Master gets greedy and his conflict) Bounty List Forever enemies and enemy hunt season Romance or Friendship?! (Nightmare escapes to the cursed crater, From ancient library of Isowitch Dreamer finds out the purpose of Crater) Hidden passage Awkward talk between Nightmare and Dreamer Return (Brief into to the 2nd book, they try to recreate the Green Moon using the Crater and 7 island secrets, getting caught and sent to Prison Rose - escape plan etc. Do not reveal too much) All Out War (Startup and development)
2. All Out Love (part 2 Greed and Lust)
3. All Out Chaos (part3 ---- and Chaos) An unpredictable event, caught between truth and shadow. The two empires and a kingdom of beasts stands at the brink of war, but can power holders keep the balance and save the world just like a millennium ago or join the war for salvation. While the history needs the justice the most, can a frail prophetic child rise from darkness and put an end to the upcoming chaos?"God is in the details" "Devil is in the detail" (Hidden from truth)Three centuries ago world peace took place until the two races controlled by worldly desires and revenge emerged to take over with a full scale war. AND NOW for the second time, the feelings of the living turns the continents upside down with an “all out war” that will decide the fate of the world. Only one side can win and rewrite the history of all. Unexpected events, the truth about the kingdom of peace, the twists between power holders will not drag you down!power holders are 6 gifted people who have unique abilities that come once in a couple of centuries from random families.Character = Main, Main-Side, Side, Side-low Goodness=None, Good, Evil Status=Unknown, Alive, Dead All the ages are based on time period of first chapter of the story.Rare Bending Types (Basic to advance forms):MN 1. Air, Water, Ice 2. Stone, Mineral, Metal 3. Fire, Dimension, Evil (possess, soul eating) 4. Plant, Poison, Healing (necromancer)Note Magic use divided into 4 sections with 3 levels each, however most people does not have any magical abilities whatsoever, and some rare people can use only one section of these bending types. Power Classes: 1. Mortal Stage (3, 4, 5, 6, 7 stars) - each mortal stage increases the power of weaponary and martial art scale. 1. Broke-mortal 2. Post-mortal 3. Semi-mortal 4. Peak-Mortal 2. Immortal Stage (9, 11, 13) - each immortal stage increases the power of mind as well as body in terms of health 1. Bounded - granted by devils/for limited years MAX Immortal Stage (Heart) 2. Regen - regeneration 3. Heart - only if heart is intact/ can move or change organs places 4. Peak-Immortal - Requires eating all hearts of power holders (person need to be in Heart Stage) OR approval from all devils(only can be sealed into eternal realm item). - NO ETERNAL YOUTHNote Martial arts has the power classes, however they are in limited numbers and most of the lower ranking officials have no power at all. They use middle history weaponary such as swords, spear, arrow... No cultivation; only training, willpower and ancestrial blood is required to achieve power classes. The mainCh sees a dream about the outer universe, galaxies and suddenly everything changes into the smallest particle and he suddenly wakes up in the middle of the night. Something awakens in him but he does not realize anything and he does not know what he saw exactly because of his knowledge level and he goes to sleep after a sip of water. Next morning he hears some guards are talking about an award winning championship on the warrior arena which he wants to see so much because since he was born he could not be able to leave the royal palace without any permissions from the empress. He wants to discover what is outside of the palace. After a week later at the day of the arena championship, when the number of guards are low he escapes from the palace to visit the arena. Over there he gets to know each other with the Magic master and becomes friends. Later they together joins the royal army of the south. A huge news comes from the North empire about a never ending fight between two power holders called Strength body and Strength master. The North E. requests troops to stop the fight from South and when the conflict is solved Strength body joins the dreamer's team but Strength master vanishes without a trace. After a short amount time later they hear about a New Beast War is about to start soon. The North and South comes to an agreement in the great military summit/console (with the kind of help of the solved conflict) and they select a Supreme commander from North E. to represent both armies of South and North. All generals falls under the Supreme commander's command for the war preparations. While these are happening the dreamer's team discovers the corrupt government system under the North E. and some clues from the sacred library of Northern palace the clues leads them to a graveyard which is supposedly needs to be the great emperor's grave but instead they find an already opened tomb stone leading them to a underground staircase. When they reach the main corridor they find someone really old over ground laying with a girl beside her which they later find out that she was the nightmare. but when she realizes them she escapes with some tricks. After they help the great emperor heal and learn the truth about the old peaceful land and the ancient beast war details. They immediately try to go and stop the war however the nightmare left them a surprise and they somehow unable to leave because of the illusory tunnels and they get stuck there for almost a month. When they solve the puzzles of the nightmare and finally escape from the underground, they find themselves in an unbelievable situation which the new beast war has already started and the beast kingdom is almost has lost to the Supreme commander. However at that further into the war area on the side of Beast K. they see a summoning platform with 13 people on it and while the dreamer's team tries to stop the summon, the war ground turns upside down with a mythical dragon with the height of a mountain which can destroy the whole city and royal palace with one hand. After the summon the supreme commender surrenders to the Beast Emperor and gets to be the right hand man of him. The dreamer's team hardly escapes could not be able to do anything and with countless wounds on them. The Two Empire's gets doomed as a result and the Beast Kingdom armies and solders slowly captures the all land left by the Empires and dominates the world. While A Kill Bounty list has issued for the capture for dreamer's team. The nightmare as the lead and her group of assassins tries every way annihilate the dreamer and his team. The barriers of the capital cities are almost broken and when the mythical dragon arrives, the castle walls falls and nothing stays still from the flames and a nightmare will be upon the people of the Empires. Will dreamer accomplish the world peace by awaking his abilities and use moon's power to replenish the peace upon the world?Goal of Empires: Defeat the Beast king, to regain world peace and order. To full fill the request from the great emperor's scroll. However corrupt government system has its roots in the Northern Empire which leads to unexpected twists.All Empire and Kingdoms are trying to use the power holders to their advantage in the war and further in the book, it will cause to downfall of the world with the defeat of dreamer and his allies.The deceptions, lies and illusions will twist your understanding of the book, in the later chapters and also in the next book we will try to explain what was really happening, so do not believe everything you see or hear in this book about the story's details.
An introduction to the rumors of Kingdom Of Peace, Devils and Power Holders as a story that Southern Empress says to make Dreamer sleep. A dream that comes to dreamer at that night and when he wakes up, the vessel of dreamer awakes in him. He passes guards and escapes from the palace to see the championship in arena (not first time going out in secret). He admires the Magic Master and his power and later they become friends in the future. However when the royal guards realize he has escaped, the information goes to Empress and she declares Emergency Martial Law (its her first time realizing that he is missing) to find him.
The spies sent by the Beast Kingdom thinks that they have found out and make a mess in the city to get out of the capital Itapol but the gates are locked. Some of them manages to suicide to not give information but other several of them gets caught along with Dreamer. Empress gets angry to Dreamer and tries to punish by locking him up for a while.
The Magic Master comes to the palace by an invite from the Empress to receive reward for the championship he has won in the arena. When he sees Dreamer on hallway with royal guards, he helps him by talking with the Empress. A condition is set for Dreamer's innocence (she will already release him but she gives an excuse to Magic Master to join their military operation team). Later he accepts because he is interested in Dreamer's future powers as he has seen some sparks from him about bending reality.
An attack in Northern Empire, Ronna and the city gets half demolished by Strength Master and Supreme Body. The Daisy Kingdom cannot stop the the two of them from attacking each other in the middle of the city, later they request backup from capital Luna but it is going to take a lot longer than expected and the city will be on ground by then so they request support from Nance Kingdom, Gate city. When the backup arrives Strength Master escapes and disappears. They highly regard the Southern Empire as a result of their support.
Several years later, after this incident when the political relation gets improved between the Empires. A military tactical team gets forms to assist the Royal people Conference that will happen in Northern Empire. It includes Dreamer and Magic Master.
In their visit to Luna, they also become spy and learns some intel about the government from bars and the royal palace. From what they have found, they realize Northern Empire became corrupted by Beast Kingdom and some illegal gun and money trades are happenning behind the scenes. They further investigate at night.
After collecting intel, when they come back from the trip, they don't tell about it much to the Empress because there is something strange about the rumors in Northern Empire about Nightmare and her illusions. They believe most of the stuff they heard was just a deception because some dark clothed man comes into the bar and tells them. (when they open a conversation with him). The war becomes more serious with some assasination attempt to Southern Empress and Northern Emperor (this one is fake, reader will realize it later).
The two Empires comes together in the war to defeat the common enemy Beast Kingdom. In Ancient General Summit in Luna, All the generals from two Empires choses a Supreme Commender to lead the war.
In war preparations, they send Dreamer and his team to Wastelands to collect and draw map of the area, the places where military camps can be put, tactics etc.
On the way back they encounter someone that claims himself to be The Saint and giving cure to people who needs it. When Dreamer recognizes him from the statue that he saw in Luna, Monk Temple Ruins. However when she sees them she tries to escape and they chase her. She attacks with the moves of The Saint as an illusion and escapes.
On the way back a group of beasts man attacks them including the Divine Body but at some point with the clash with Magic Master, she cannot hold on and lose but a secret comes out, when she blocks an extreme attack from him. An old man becomes visible in blood while protecting the girl and says do not attack. When they hear the story from the old guy explaining himself as The Saint, almost everything becomes clear. (because his single move should not be visible to other people and only the attacked person should see it - Nightmare does not know this and everyone can see the illusion she casted). From the story of Saint, they learn a rumor about the Great Emperor still alive. They do not believe it at first, so Dreamer and others go to ancient graveyard to confirm his death by they somehow encounter a hidden staircase going down in the middle of the grave. When they travel long enough, a discovery of living Great Emperor will be made but everyone will be trapped with Nightmare's prison even though the Emperor will warn them to not get close.

item.title: Devils
item.description: It is said to that there are 3 different devils: Wrath/Chaos (sealed in Earrings - just an assumption) Lust (sealed in Necklace pieces) Lust (sealed in Rings) Each sealed item needs to be collected in order to retrieve the power of devil. Each has 5 pieces in total to summon the devil from eternal prison using sacrifice method. General Abilities: They are immortal and can grant someone immortality (temporary-unless unsealed), Undo or remove all the curses on someone (temporary-unless unsealed).Abilities of the devil includes, mind control by going in others soul, no physical attacks works (some exceptions may apply), can learn personal information and emotions through touch. Can imitate others for short amount of time. Some people’s mind can surpass the devil and make him unable to enter. Has no physical body and all his doing is through possessing others. One of the only immortals as he cannot be destroyed completely.Devils (legendary immortals) get their power from the emotions humans and beasts feel (Greed, Lust and helping Chaos). When they are sealed their power drops drastically and when unsealed they need to regain their power again because the Eternal Prison consumes their power and uses it against them to lock them forever.Devils have a history of becoming legends, however we wont be going to talk about it except which one came first. 1. Chaos, 2. Lust, 3. GreedFor legendary devils, even by looking their eyes you can feel the emotion (if greed then greed) like kill intentAn old geezer with the long hands of a demon with long nails. Each finger has a specific valuable ring from the ancient history of emperors or generals. One hand gesture can bring down an entire army to his knees. Has control over greed, can manage and rule the people that have greed in their heart. Books and stories mentiones his return and conquring the world with greed. When the devil of greed comes back, he will demonstrate his authority to everyone including the beast king, while he is sitting his throne, the devil will use his supression to kneel everyone and even collapse the golden throne and beast king will be sitting in the ground. The rings that contains the devil of chaos is in the hands of the devil of greed and he helped the great emperor to lock him up but later betrayed the emperor and became the immortal because of his unamountable greed. He has so many treasury rings that belongs to the old emperors, generals, Marshals as a greedy collection Story (Book 1&2): He is the oldest immortal, he is known with his greed for everything, including stealing and robbing precious gemstones, and royal treasury of ancient empires and kingdoms (like rings, necklaces, wristbands etc.). He has become so greedy because he had nothing in his childhood as a generational slave for a rich family and while growing up become the slave of his pleasure and greed. A beauty queen that can steal any man's heart unless they are resistant enough. Can lead people to immoral pathway by just looking and controls people's natural ability of lust. Has long dark hair with olive like eyes that can attract any living being including monsters, beasts and humans. Books explicitly mentions some of the story details. Story (Book 2): She is from a royal family, she had a family and friend complex which resulted in unwanted lust increase (not only sexual but also gluttony) and always wanted to get attention as a girl but never had a real/serious relationship with someone which made her restless. She did not chose to become a devil but instead her husband collected all the immortality ritual material by killing power holders with different tricky conditions and later sacrificed himself (as a power holder) and she came back as a devil of lust.A dark lord known to be pure darkness and the youngets of all legendary devils. Always has some insidious plans, mostly sneaks in group of people in high rank to establish control and flow of the room so that can create chaos around the world. No one has ever seen his body, known in only stories and legends. There is no evidence of his existence except the legends. legend of Chaos (devil) will be wearing muscular human skin with other skin of monsters as gears and his helmet made of magic concentrated human skull but he is a monster himself. Story (Book 2&3): An unknown personality appeared during the Kingdom of Peace Era within the Kings, later will be called "Judas". He is searching for revenge and nothing else. He did not land a single hand in the process of killing any of the power holders and instead created a chaos and manipulated by spreading his ideologies (similar to capitalism, marxism, communism but way smarter just like a literal Satan). He was the mastermind behind the Ancient Beast War behind the scenes. Asked to the legendary devils: "why are not you concerned about losing or divine punishment?", they said: "I got nothing to lose", The person continued: "Aren't you worried about your family or do you not have anyone, any desire you are afraid to lose?", They said "I am mere particals trying to define himself based on this place but I was literally nothing and the God have given me meaning by creating me, so I belong to him. However he has also given me ability to think and decide for myself if I do what the God wants then there is no fun because if he wanted long ago he could have made me submit to him but he did not so there might be something he is willing for which the final test and to accomplish it, the chaos, greed and lust as the biggest necessities. If there was no challenge and test in on Earth then it would not have existed and someone has to be the sacrifice goat or servant to accomplish the God's will. I am the challenge and test you are about to give!!!"You cannot change the government system using the system because it is design to keep the president in check, so that the dictatorship does not happen, however since the system does not evolve into something keeps all the agencies of the government in check. President can apply any law when he has the senators and the parliament. Corruptability of these kind of systems are really high which raises the question, is rebellion justified? If you cannot change the system using the system and the people on top of the hirearchy can do anything with a single command then maybe...

item.title: The Saint
item.description:
A famous monk that has a statue in the capital of Northern Empire, Luna and it is said that he has mastered the emotion control which granted him divine powers. He creates various monuments that applies justice, "the bridge of justice" (a deep hole to hell with a bridge comes containing the sacrifice in the middle and according to heaviness of his/her sins and evilness, the person receives a pyschological and physical punishment from skeletons and monsters giving him pain), one of the trump card is "the sword of both worlds" which nullifies everything on its path when the huge sword is fully emerged from the sky with a light storm.(can be used, when there are so many sinful and evil people in an area). The old guy is living for 100s of years and his weakness is feeling a strong emotion at a moment. To avoid such a weakness he has mastered emotion control and even if one emotion tries to take over the other opposite emotion suprasses it. That means his face is literally half happy/smiling and half sad/crying at one moment when casting a power.His powers may erase someone's sins based on if the person receiving punishment has a will to submission to the God.
The Nightmare once will imitate the saint from his status in the temples and will show some guidance to dream and his team and later in the form of saint she will attack them with saint’s moves as a fake but instead he will do her own power but showing herself as saint.
--The real saint will be showing up while protecting the fake Divine Body. There won’t be magic resistance master but instead the saint himself will join Dreamer’s team. He was protecting the child because he had made a promise to the great emperor as his royal knight because the emperor said he will have the dreamer’s blood but there will be a mistake and confusion and doubt for everyone. Later the reader will learn that he is someone important(not sure who yet)--WRONG instead it will be Supreme Body If you succeed in solitude, you will be able to use divine powers as a hermit. Peace keeper/ The Saint: In order to grow, you need to know yourself emotionally, strengths and your flaws. There are some which cannot be avoided no matter what such as Lust, Greed and Chaos. A Man can try to prevent the lust and greed by becoming blind but, at the end of the tunnel the fear of turning into lustful and greedy person makes him lose himself. There are no easy ways to prevent the human nature, the gifts and punishments that is given at birth. The only options you will ever have are "monster"(losing himself to weaknesses), "balance" and "fear"(blinding himself to prevent weaknesses) for all. It is easy to become a monster and only a weak person can fear all his life... but balance is the hardest one of all which requires willpower and the smile of the fate. Time is a resource as all the tools and utilities such as money, if you keep your head in the sand and not know how to use these tools for the better good or give your control over to them then you cannot further crack the small flaws of lust and greed.

item.title: Kingdom Of Peace
item.description:
A peaceful land was living in the dark without any wars or lack of love but one summer night everything was about to change, the two nations had born without any warning and the first couple of decades was usual as peaceful as ever then before but an unexpected event occurred in an unknown street which created the first scars of its kind to its nation. A butterfly effect later, this scar of nation turned into a war that will be called Ancient Beast War, however the leaders of the nations, the great emperor tried to settle the war between these two races but when the news of the war reached to the empire, it was already too late and it was too unusual that no body wanted to believe such a thing in a land that has forgotten what "war" is because that was how peaceful the empire was. When the swords and spears were taken to war the Humans and Beasts could not bear to see each other so when the empire’s royal soldiers came to put an end to it, they destroyed the soldiers without any hesitation, the war continued every day and night because peace was never an option for them. The great emperor could not stop any one of the sides . At the end of the Ancient Beast War as a result, the empire divided into three continents containing: Beast Kingdom, Northern Empire, Southern Empire. Between the Empires and the Beast Kingdom, the unhabitable area called Wastelands created which made the border for the countries.Also based on a legend, the only anomalies wasn’t this war, some strange power holders rose through the world. The fighting arenas went popular during the after war era and this time, the previous peace has replaced by pleasure and desires of the living.According to a rumor, Initially there was 12 kings and 1 emperor and they have all agreed and voted for the project with details not know to man. The project worked for almost 800 years and kept the world in peace but one day, someone from the darkness (legend of chaos) warned the people of the beast by showing an exit from the project which caused a disturbtion. Caused a war between humans and beasts later called "ancient beast war". Beasts did not wanted to believe any words of humans anymore. This revolution brought a new idea to beasts about peace and, what they learned from old kingdom of peace was that it was never a equal peace. However based on some sources of human nations, that 12 kings who decided the fate of the world, there were 4 beast kings among them. It is said that one of the 13 has betrayed the empire and became the one called "devil of chaos". However no one has seen this person, it was only a legend that tied the Kingdom of Peace and the current political placeholders.
Southern Empire and Northern Empire were united in the past, but because of some small grudges between blood relatives of Great Emperor, The heir family and the relatives separated in their own ways and they do not attack each other to show respect to the Great Emperor. However South holds much more military and financial power than North and this made North even a greater target for outsiders. Later the country became corrupted from inside with fake and illusiory government officials under the Northern Kings. Even the generals and some Kings of the North became a slave and a servant to the Beast King.

item.title: Power Holders
item.description:
Legendary Power Holder Bending Types: 1. Dreamer: Reality (for a limited time), Time (slow or fast, you also get effected)
2. Nightmare: Illusion, Sense (5 senses), Emotion (increase, decrease...) - there may some side effects or only casts one at a time (can becomes powerless against enemies during casting)
3. Magic Master:Magic (including all rare bending types, can grant others magic to some extent)
4. Strength Master:Strength (change yourself and other's physical strength to some extent)
5. Divine Body :Defense 1 (magic absorbtion & reuse, magic nullification)
6. Supreme Body: Defense 2 (strength absorbtion & reuse, strength nullification) They can make things permanent in a limited area by sacrificing their life and body. Sometimes can curse or heal someone for a lineage as well. Curses on someone can transfer through blood or sexual interactions based on the caster's power and life span left.
They have emotional and physical de buffs such that Nightmare is actually have a curse of being ugly and always wears beautifying deception and a physical face mask for pretending to protect her beauty. Also has other permanent binding curses that reduces her powers and disgusts others around her because of her being the Nightmare's vessel. A vessel is said to be having the power and blood of a power holder. They carry some burdens and mostly emotional de buffs that comes with the power. The will of the blood and vessel's ideas does not conflict but sometimes effects the important decisions and ideas.

It caused a global breakout, including a long food shortages and brought drought to the lands because of so much blood. It lasted 51 years and ended with the independence agreement between two parties (Humans and Beasts).
The war was so intense because of emergence of Power Holders and Dragons. Later this caused Dragon species to become extinct. Also world map has changed as it is today. Including some landmarks like 7 Islands and Wastelands.

item.title: 7 Islands
item.description: Weather: Tropical Rains (Too much) Part of the Beast Kingdom and it is located on the western region of the volcano. Some mineral mines, tropical fruit and fishing trade markets has been established all around this region.

item.title: Wastelands
item.description: Ruler: None Cities: Rocky, Gravos, Serdica, Pautalia Places: Wastelands does not follow any ruler and have slave markets and the greatest black market auctions. It is often called 'Lawless state' or "Dead land" because no lawmaker exists and there are no plans or living, except some illegal businesses and criminals who escaped from Empires.

item.title: Gate of Solstice
item.description: The road and gate connects the Two Empires. Used mainly for trade and political purposes. It is located in Unreal Mountains. The closes two big cities are Capital Gate (Nance Kingdom) and Capital Ronna (Daisy Kingdom).

item.title: Eternal Prison
item.description: This is an ancient technique which is used for sealing devils and supressing their powers using an eternal realm item (unbreakable divine item). This is done by a willing sacrifice made by power holders. As a result of the sacrifice the power holder must die. However later in a Secret Scroll of The Empress, more will be discovered.

item.title: Secret Scroll of The Empress
item.description: This scroll has been passed down from the Great Emperor to his ancestors and contains how to perform the Eternal Prison and details about the devils including how to bypass the sacrifice ritual with a trick and unseal the devils faster.
item.guid: Book Series/Keywords/Secret Scroll of The Empress.md

item.title: The Dungeon
item.description: A secret organization with the goal of "Project Dungeon" under a person called "dungeon leader" which has the headquarters stationed under a south west city close to the Beast Kingdom. Approximately 8150 believers exist in the dungeon but a small amount of people stays in HQ as others serve the dungeon leader and the grand elders. Others are spread to other cities to gather information and news by spying the current condition of the South and North Kingdoms.Project dungeon encourages power holders to sacrifice themselves to add an extra layer of protection/seal to eternal realm items using Eternal Prison technique which holds the devil’s pieces in. Each piece contains a power of the devil which cannot be destroyed completely and only be sealed. Some groups are trying to awaken and restore the devil that was once the supreme leader of evils
